/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentDtoList */
SELECT C.* FROM ( SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS RNUM , A.* , WV.VOTE , ( SELECT CP.PREFER FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND CP.COMMENT_NO = A.COMMENT_NO AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} ) AS "PREFER" FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT CC WHERE 1 = 1 AND CC.PARENT = C.COMMENT_NO ) LOW_COMMENT_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME , C.USE_YN FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} AND U.USER_ID = C.REGPE_ID ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID , ( SELECT @ROWNUM := 0 ) R WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY A.REG_DTS ASC ) B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.RNUM <= #{end} ) C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.RNUM > #{start}

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getLowCommentDtoList */
SELECT A.* , WV.VOTE , ( SELECT CP.PREFER FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND CP.COMMENT_NO = A.COMMENT_NO AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} ) AS "PREFER" FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME , C.USE_YN FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.DEPTH = #{depth} AND C.PARENT = #{parent} AND U.USER_ID = C.REGPE_ID ORDER BY C.REG_DTS ASC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentDto */ SELECT A.* , WV.VOTE FROM ( SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.DEPTH , C.RECOM_NUM , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS , U.NICKNAME FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND C.COMMENT_NO = #{comment_no} AND C.REGPE_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY C.REG_DTS DESC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN WRITING_VOTE WV ON WV.WRITING_NO = A.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = A.REGPE_ID WHERE 1 = 1

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getCommentPrefer */ SELECT CP.WRITING_NO , CP.COMMENT_NO , CP.USER_ID , CP.PREFER , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , CP.REG_DTS , CP.MOD_DTS FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP , COMMENT C WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = #{writing_no} AND CP.COMMENT_NO = #{comment_no} AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND C.COMMENT_NO = CP.COMMENT_NO

/* com.quiz.mapper.commentMapper.getChildCommentList */ SELECT C.WRITING_NO , C.COMMENT_NO , C.PARENT , C.COMMENT_CONTENT , C.RECOM_NUM , C.HATE_NUM , C.DEPTH , ( SELECT CP.PREFER FROM COMMENT_PREFER CP WHERE 1 = 1 AND CP.WRITING_NO = C.WRITING_NO AND CP.USER_ID = #{user_id} AND CP.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO ) PREFER , ( SELECT WV.VOTE FROM WRITING_VOTE WV WHERE 1 = 1 AND WV.WRITING_NO = C.WRITING_NO AND WV.USER_ID = C.REGPE_ID ) VOTE , U.NICKNAME , C.REGPE_ID , C.REG_DTS , C.MOD_DTS FROM COMMENT C , USER U WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.PARENT = #{comment_no} AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND U.USER_ID = C.REGPE_ID ORDER BY REG_DTS
